page.title: 11WORSBROUGH COUNTRY PARK
page.content: The country park consists of a{mill} which is water driven and a{reservoir} as well as the surrounding land.Around the reservoir is an area of{deciduous {woodland}.There is a great variety of wildlife in the country park and round the reservoir. There are many interesting walks and there are many things to look at. People can find out a lot from the activities that take place in the park.One of the activities is pond dipping.People come with nets and jars to find out more about pond life. Another activity is drawing birds.Birdlovers arrive with sketchpads and binoculars.Many different species of water and woodland birds live in the park. Activity days are organised where experts in natural history, photography,and art show members of public,around the park.
